greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Exponent of largest prime power factor of n, a(1)=0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: (PARI) A088388(n) = if(1==n,0,my(f=factor(n)); isprimepower(vecmax(vector(#f[, 1], i, f[i, 1]^f[i, 2])))); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 22 2018
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 28 2003
